bhayato upasaggato calato pabhaṅguto adhuvato atāṇato aleṇato asaraṇato rittato tucchato suññato anattato ādīnavato

idha bhikkhu santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ atthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchando'ti pajānāti, asantaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ n'atthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchando'ti pajānāti

duddadaṃ dadamānānaṃ, dukkaraṃ kamma kubbataṃ.
asanto n'ānukubbanti, sataṃ dhammo durannayo
manāpe rūpe rāgaṃ, amanāpe dosaṃ, asamapekkhite mohan'ti evaṃ rāg'ādikilese anuppādento upekkhakabhāvena sahati.

sekkhā dhammā. asekkhā dhammā. n'eva sekkhā na-asekkhā dhammā.

jīno rath'assaṃ maṇikuṇḍale ca, putte ca dāre ca that'eva jīno.
sabbesu bhogesu asesitesu, kasmā na santappasi sokakāle.
ahaṃ, bhante, pāpakammaṃ akāsiṃ gārayhaṃ assapuṭaṃ. yena me āyasmanto attamanā honti taṃ karomī'ti.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso kāḷakaṃ vatthaṃ paridhāya kese pakiritvā assapuṭaṃ khandhe āropetvā mahājanakāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare vassānautu. asmiṃ utumhi assayujamāsassa kāḷapakkhe catutthaṃ, ravivāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
aho vat'āhaṃ tadantaraṃ jīveyyaṃ yadantaraṃ assasitvā vā passasāmi, passasitvā vā assasāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṃ manasi kareyyaṃ, bahu vata me kataṃ assā'ti
pītipaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmī'ti sikkhati, pītipaṭisaṃvedī passasissāmī'ti sikkhati.
evaṃ no ayaṃ amhākaṃ pabbajjā avaṅkatā avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā.
kusalā cetanā kām'āvacarā rūp'āvacarā dānamayā sīlamayā bhāvanāmayā, ayaṃ vuccati puññ'ābhisaṅkhāro.
seyyathā'pi puriso medaka-thālikaṃ parihareyya chidda-avachiddaṃ uggharantaṃ paggharantaṃ; evam'evaṃ kho ahaṃ imaṃ kāyaṃ pariharāmi
dutiyo musalo paripatitvā aññatarassa dārakassa matthake avatthāsi. so kālamakāsi.
tass'eva kho pana pubbe aviddasuno abhijjhā hoti chando sārāgo. sv'āssa pahīno hoti ucchinnamūlo tāla-avatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo.
sabbe te rogā, sabbe te bhayā, sabbe te antarāyā, sabbe te upaddavā, sabbe te dunnimittā, sabbe te avamaṅgalā vinassantu
pharitvāna mettaṃ samettā bhadantā avikkhittacittā parittaṃ bhaṇantu
puna caparaṃ idh'ekacco kāye avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
so avicikiccho samāno bhabbo rāgaṃ pahātuṃ dosaṃ pahātuṃ mohaṃ pahātuṃ.
cakkhu'ndriyassa sot'indriyassa ghān'indriyassa jivh'indriyassa kāy'indriyassa. atthi, bhikkhave, mano, atthi dhammā, atthi avijjādhātu.
asītivassasahass'āyukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ayaṃ jambudīpo avīci maññe phuṭo bhavissati manussehi, seyyathā'pi naḷavanaṃ vā saravanaṃ vā.
yo tattha saṃyamo saṃvaro avītikkamo, idaṃ sīlaṃ. yaṃ samādānaṃ taṃ vataṃ. saṃvar'aṭṭhena sīlaṃ, samādān'aṭṭhena vataṃ

evaṃ vihārim'ātāpiṃ,
ahorattam'atanditaṃ.
taṃ ve bhadd'ekaratto'ti,
santo ācikkhate muni.

diṭṭhiñ'ca nissāya anupucchamāno,
samuggahītesu pamoham'āgā,
ito ca n'āddakkhi aṇum'pi saññaṃ,
tasmā tuvaṃ momuhato dahāsi.
etha tumhe, āvuso, sīlavā hotha, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā viharatha ācāragocarasampannā aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvino, samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesū'ti
tañ'ca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṃ paṭicca; n'eva rāj'ābhinītā, na cor'ābhinītā, na iṇ'aṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā
yassa hi so, bhikkhave, atthāya usukāro tejanaṃ dvīsu alātesu ātāpeyya paritāpeyya ujuṃ kareyya kammaniyaṃ sv'āssa attho abhinipphanno hoti.

tathārūpāsu na cārittaṃ āpajjitā hoti

na vo ahaṃ, ānanda, tathā parakkamissāmi yathā kumbhakāro āmake āmakamatte. niggayha niggayh'āhaṃ, ānanda, vakkhāmi.

tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dāyaṃ ālimpesuṃ, manussā daḍḍhā kālamakaṃsu.
suṇāti na vijānāti, āloketi na passati. dhammasmiṃ bhaññamānasmiṃ, atthaṃ bālo na bujjhati. sace'pi dasa pajjote, dhārayissasi, kassapa. n'eva dakkhati rūpāni, cakkhu hi'ssa na vijjatī'ti.

atha kiñ'carahi ty'āyaṃ, sāriputta, uḷārā āsabhī vācā bhāsitā, ek'aṃso gahito, sīhanādo nadito

atha kho pāyāsi rājañño uttaraṃ māṇavaṃ āmantāpetvā etad'avoca, saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, tāta uttara, dānaṃ datvā evaṃ anuddisasi
bhikkhū ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa āvesanaṃ uttiṇam'akaṃsu.
n'eso, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye samuddo. mahā eso, bhikkhave, udakarāsi mahāudak'aṇṇavo.
bāhuṃ sahassam'abhinimmita sāvudhan'taṃ, grīmekhalaṃ uditaghorasasenamāraṃ, dān'ādidhammavidhinā jitavā mun'indo, tan'tejasā bhavatu te jayamaṅgalāni
sac'āyaṃ kulaputto app'āyo samāno uḷāraṃ jīvikaṃ kappeti, tassa bhavanti vattāro, udumbarakhādikaṃ v'āyaṃ kulaputto bhoge khādatī'ti.
pabbajitena ca pana te mātāpitaro uddassetabbā'ti.
tathārūpesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu uddh'aggikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti sovaggikaṃ sukhavipākaṃ saggasaṃvattanikaṃ.

mettañ'ca sabbalokasmiṃ, mānasam'bhāvaye aparimāṇaṃ;
uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyañ'ca, asambādhaṃ, averaṃ, asapattaṃ.

yathā vārivahā pūrā paripūrenti sāgaraṃ, evam'eva ito dinnaṃ petānaṃ upakappati.

nandopanandabhujagaṃ vibudhaṃ mah'iddhiṃ, puttena therabhujagena dam'āpayanto, iddh'ūpadesavidhinā jitavā mun'indo

chabbaggiyā bhikkhū mahānāme sakke upanandhiṃsu.
jīvako … janaṃ ussāretvā tirokaraṇiyaṃ parikkhipitvā thambhe upanibandhitvā bhariyaṃ purato ṭhapetvā udara-cchaviṃ uppāṭetvā antagaṇṭhiṃ nīharitvā bhariyāya dassesi
nissayapaccayo, upanissayapaccayo, purejātapaccayo, pacchājātapaccayo, āsevanapaccayo, kammapaccayo, vipākapaccayo, āhārapaccayo
dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa param'atthapāramiyo'ti
yathā paccayaṃ pavattamānaṃ dhātumattam'ev'etaṃ, yad idaṃ piṇḍapāto tad upabhuñjako ca puggalo, dhātumattako nissatto nijjīvo suñño,
aññataro bhikkhu heṭṭhā hutvā silaṃ uccāresi. uparimena bhikkhunā duggahitā silā heṭṭhimassa bhikkhuno matthake avatthāsi. so bhikkhu kālamakāsi

sakkatvā dhammaratanaṃ, osadhaṃ uttamaṃ varaṃ, pariḷāh'ūpasamanaṃ. dhammatejena sotthinā nassant'upaddavā sabbe, bhayā vūpasamentu te.
dhammo ca desito niyyāniko upasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito
ahaṃ, bhante, pāpakammaṃ akāsiṃ gārayhaṃ upavajjaṃ. yena me āyasmanto attamanā honti taṃ karomī'ti.
kārako kārakatāya vādaṃ upeti, atha vā vuccamāno upavadiyamāno kuppati byāpajjati patiṭṭhiyati kopañ'ca dosañ'ca appaccayañ'ca pātukaroti.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhu, telañ'ca paṭicca vaṭṭiñ'ca paṭicca telappadīpo jhāyati, tass'eva telassa ca vaṭṭiyā ca pariyādānā aññassa ca anupahārā anāhāro nibbāyati.
etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upāli
n'āhaṃ taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā rajjan'ādivasena uppajjituṃ dassāmī'ti evam'ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
uppannā dhammā. anuppannā dhammā. uppādino dhammā.
ubhatobhāgavimutto idha ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya c'assa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
amhākaṃ pana sakiṃ katāni santhatāni pañca'pi cha'pi vassāni honti, yesaṃ no dārakā uhadanti'pi ummihanti'pi undūrehi'pi khajjanti.
atthaṃ upaparikkhato dhammā nijjhānaṃ khamanti, dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā sati chando jāyati, chandajāto ussahati, ussāhetvā tuleti, tulayitvā padahati,
seyyathā'pi ādittacelo vā ādittasīso vā, tass'eva celassa vā sīsassa vā nibbāpanāya adhimattaṃ chandañ'ca vāyāmañ'ca ussāhañ'ca ussoḷhiñ'ca appaṭivāniñ'ca satiñ'ca sampajaññañ'ca kareyya.

tassa rūpamayo vego'ti samuddassa appamāṇo ūmimayo vego
idāni kho pana dve-sahassa-pañca-sata-ekatiṃsati saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, catuvīsati-divasāni atikkantāni.
dve jāyam'patikā taṃ ekaputtakaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ vadhitvā vallūrañ'ca soṇḍikañ'ca karitvā puttamaṃsāni khādantā

ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ vā'pi,
yo'dha pāṇaṃ vihiṃsati,
yassa pāṇe dayā n'atthi,
taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.

idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasata-ekūnasata saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, catuvīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatatesaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, ekūnavīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaramānā anussaranti sabb'ete pañc'upādānakkhandhe anussaranti etesaṃ vā aññataraṃ.
etha tumhe mā anussavena, mā param'parāya, mā itikirāya, mā piṭaka-sampadānena, mā takkahetu, mā nayahetu

na munī gāmam'āgamma, kulesu sahasā care.
ghās'esanaṃ chinnakatho, na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇe.
evam'ayaṃ puggalo āyatiṃ aparihānadhammo bhavissatī'ti.
kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ āyasmato anuruddhassa evam'ārocimha, imāsañ'ca imāsañ'ca vihārasamāpattīnaṃ mayaṃ lābhino'ti
ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sīlavā hohi, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharāhi ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhassu sikkhāpadesū'ti
yo pana bhikkhu suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tesaṃ rasapathaviṃ aṅguliyā sāyataṃ acchādesi, taṇhā ca tesaṃ okkami.
oṇojeth'āvuso, saṅghassa cīvaran'ti.
atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro sovaṇṇamayaṃ bhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā bhagavato oṇojesi
cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipākajinassa anādīnavadassāvino assutavato puthujjanassa.
asaṃvutaṃ hutvā osaramānaṃ kiles'uppattiyā kāraṇabhāvena sadosagamanena gacchatī'ti samuddan'aṭṭhena'pi samuddo.
tena hi tvaṃ mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa pūrāpetvā sakaṭehi nibbāhāpetvā majjhe gaṅgāya sote osādehi.
ayañ'ca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi appamāṇo ca oḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamm'eva devānaṃ dev'ānubhāvaṃ.
tasmā't'iha, bhikkhave, imaṃ kakac'ūpamaṃ ovādaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ manasikarotha. taṃ vo bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā'ti.
kacci nu kho maṃ anuvicca viññū sabrahmacārī sīlato na upavadantī'ti pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ
ambil'aggehi'pi, tittak'aggehi'pi, kaṭuk'aggehi'pi, madhur'aggehi'pi, khārikehi'pi, akhārikehi'pi, loṇikehi'pi, aloṇikehi'pi.
adāsi me akāsi me, ñātimittā sakhā ca me. petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dajjā, pubbe katam'anussaraṃ.

kati jāgarataṃ suttā, kati suttesu jāgarā.
katīhi rajam'ādeti, katīhi parisujjhatī'ti.
kabaḷiṅ'kāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthaṃ
katame cattāro? kabaḷīkāro āhāro, oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthaṃ.
uposathakaraṇato pubbe navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti
atha kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā, nikkhante paṭhame yāme, uṭṭhāy'āsanā ek'aṃsaṃ uttar'āsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā ten'añjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etad'avoca
uposathakammassa pattakallattaṃ viditvā idāni kariyamāno uposatho saṅghena anumānetabbo.
handa mayaṃ buddhassa bhagavato pubbabhāganamakāraṃ karomase
janapadakalyāṇī naccati gāyatī'ti kho, bhikkhave, bhiyyosomattāya mahājanakāyo sannipateyya.
seyyathā'pi balavā saṅkhadhamo appakasiren'eva catuddisā viññāpeyya, evam'eva kho evaṃ bhāvitāya mettāya cetovimuttiyā yaṃ pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ na taṃ tatr'āvasissati, na taṃ tatr'āvatiṭṭhati.

na kahāpaṇavassena, titti kāmesu vijjati.
appassādā dukhā kāmā, iti viññāya paṇḍito
taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban'ti
yo c'āyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukh'allik'ānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasañhito
kusalā cetanā kām'āvacarā rūp'āvacarā dānamayā sīlamayā bhāvanāmayā, ayaṃ vuccati puññ'ābhisaṅkhāro.
ye te bhikkhū tiracchānakathikā kāyadaḷhibahulā viharanti tesam'pi ekajjhaṃ sen'āsanaṃ paññapeti, im'āyap'ime āyasmanto ratiyā acchissantī'ti.
kāyasakkhi – idha ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya c'assa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tattha katamo kāyasaṅkhāro? kāyasañcetanā kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsañcetanā vacīsaṅkhāro, manosañcetanā cittasaṅkhāro.
kāyaviveko ca vūpakaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhamm'ābhiratānaṃ
kārako kārakatāya vādaṃ upeti, atha vā vuccamāno upavadiyamāno kuppati byāpajjati patiṭṭhiyati kopañ'ca dosañ'ca appaccayañ'ca pātukaroti.
ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena idh'ekaccaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasayha pasayha kāraṇaṃ karonti?
tassa mukh'ādhāne kāraṇaṃ kāriyamānassa honti y'eva visūkāyitāni visevitāni vipphanditāni kānici kānici, yathā taṃ akāritapubbaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāriyamānassa.
tassa mukh'ādhāne kāraṇaṃ kāriyamānassa honti y'eva visūkāyitāni visevitāni vipphanditāni kānici kānici, yathā taṃ akāritapubbaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāriyamānassa.

sabba-kāruka-sippāni, cittiṃ katvāna sikkhare.
avūpasantā ajjhattaṃ, sāmaññ'attho'ti acchati .
tena bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ, atthi nu kho me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīnā ye me assu rattiṃ kālaṃ karontassa antarāyāyā'ti
yācitak'ūpamā kāmā tāvakālik'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
yāvatā, bhikkhave, kāsikosalā, yāvatā rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vijitaṃ, rājā tattha pasenadi kosalo aggam'akkhāyati.
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare hem'antautu. asmiṃ utumhi phussamāsassa kāḷapakkhe catutthaṃ, ravivāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

kileseh'ābhibhūtā te, tena tena vidhāvitā.
narā kilesavatthūsu, sasaṅgāme'va ghosite.
so upaṭṭhaheyya pubb'uṭṭhāyī pacchānipātī kiṃ kārapaṭissāvī manāpa-cārī piyavādī.
asīti-vassa-sahass'āyukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ayaṃ jambudīpo iddho c'eva bhavissati phīto ca, kukkuṭasampātikā gāma-nigama-rājadhāniyo.
kiṃ nu kujjhasi mā kujjhi, akkodho tissa te varaṃ

kumbh'ūpamaṃ kāyam'imaṃ viditvā, nagar'ūpamaṃ cittam'idaṃ ṭhapetvā.
yodhetha māraṃ paññ'āvudhena, jitañ'ca rakkhe anivesano siyā.
ime, bhante, licchavi-kumārakā caṇḍā pharusā apajahā ... kul'itthīnam'pi kulakumārīnam'pi pacchāliyaṃ khipanti.
na arahati bhavaṃ kūṭadanto samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ. samaṇo tv'eva gotamo arahati bhavantaṃ kūṭadantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ
aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño, aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño'ti! iti h'idaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa aññāsikoṇḍañño' tv'eva nāmaṃ ahosī'ti.
kesu na mānaṃ kayirātha, kesu c'assa sagāravo. ky'assa apacitā assu, ky'assu sādhu supūjitā'ti.
seyyathā'pi, āvuso, balavā puriso tiṇhena khaggena muddhani abhimattheyya, evam'eva kho, āvuso, adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.

sītañ'ca uṇhañ'ca khudaṃ pipāsaṃ, vāt'ātape ḍaṃsasarīsape ca.
sabbāni'p'etāni abhisambhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
yo pana bhikkhu sañcarittaṃ samāpajjeyya itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ purisassa vā itthimatiṃ jāyattane vā jārattane vā, antamaso taṅ'khaṇikāya'pi, saṅghādiseso.
idam'pi kho, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyassa khaṇḍam'pi chiddam'pi sabalam'pi kammāsam'pi.
catutthaṃ paññā-pārami, pañcamaṃ viriya-pārami, chaṭṭhamaṃ khantipārami, sattamaṃ sacca-pārami
kharassarena paṇavena rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ parinetvā dakkhiṇena dvārena nikkhāmetvā dakkhiṇato nagarassa sīsaṃ chindathā'ti.

aṭṭha dhut'aṅgāni, āraññik'aṅgaṃ, piṇḍapātik'aṅgaṃ, paṃsukūlik'aṅgaṃ, tecīvarik'aṅgaṃ, sapadānacārik'aṅgaṃ, khalupacchābhattik'aṅgaṃ, nesajjik'aṅgaṃ, yathāsanthatik'aṅgaṃ, idaṃ vuccati vataṃ, na sīlaṃ.

aṭṭha dhut'aṅgāni, āraññik'aṅgaṃ, piṇḍapātik'aṅgaṃ, paṃsukūlik'aṅgaṃ, tecīvarik'aṅgaṃ, sapadānacārik'aṅgaṃ, khalupacchābhattik'aṅgaṃ, nesajjik'aṅgaṃ, yathāsanthatik'aṅgaṃ, idaṃ vuccati vataṃ, na sīlaṃ.
gacchatha, bho, imaṃ purisaṃ daḷhāya rajjuyā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā khuramuṇḍaṃ karitvā
tena kho pana samayena āyasmā khemako badarik'ārāme viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
atha khv'etaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānañ'c'eva appasādāya, pasannānañ'ca ekaccānaṃ aññathattāyā'ti.
upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi. sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekam'antaṃ nisīdi. ekam'antaṃ nisinno kho gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etad'avoca
duggāhadiṭṭhibhujagena sudaṭṭhahatthaṃ, brahmaṃ visuddhijutim'iddhibak'ābhidhānaṃ, ñāṇāgadena vidhinā jitavā mun'indo
puna caparaṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu ghānena gandhaṃ ghatvā gandhappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti gandharāga-ppaṭisaṃvedī ca.
puna caparaṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu ghānena gandhaṃ ghatvā gandhappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti gandharāga-ppaṭisaṃvedī ca.
puna caparaṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu ghānena gandhaṃ ghatvā gandhappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti gandharāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.

satiyā taṃ nibandhissaṃ, payutto te damessāmi,
vīriya-dhura-niggahito, na'y'ito dūraṃ gamissase cittā'ti.

seyyathā'pi rañño paccantime nagare esikā hoti gambhīranemā sunikhātā acalā asampavedhī abbhantarānaṃ guttiyā bāhirānaṃ paṭighātāya. evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ

tasmā hi attakāmena, mahattam'abhikaṅkhatā.
saddhammo garukātabbo, saraṃ buddhāna sāsanan'ti.
atha kiñ'carahi ty'āyaṃ, sāriputta, uḷārā āsabhī vācā bhāsitā, ek'aṃso gahito, sīhanādo nadito
api ca kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃ vā tiropākāraṃ vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā
gacchatha, bho, imaṃ purisaṃ daḷhāya rajjuyā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā khuramuṇḍaṃ karitvā
evañ'hi so, bhikkhave, maccho gila-baḷiso bāḷisikassa anayaṃ āpanno byasanaṃ āpanno yathākāmakaraṇīyo bāḷisikassa.
evañ'hi so, bhikkhave, maccho gilabaḷiso bāḷisikassa anayaṃ āpanno byasanaṃ āpanno yathākāmakaraṇīyo bāḷisikassa.
tath'ūpam'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmi gihibhogā ca parihīno, sāmaññatthañ'ca na paripūreti.
na kamm'ārāmatā, na bhass'ārāmatā, na nidd'ārāmatā, na saṅgaṇik'ārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, asaṃsagg'ārāmatā, nippapañc'ārāmatā.
yathā, mahārāja, nagaraguttiko majjhe nagarasiṅghāṭake nisinno passeyya puratthimadisato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ
nāḷāgiriṃ gajavaraṃ atimattabhūtaṃ, dāv'aggicakkam'asanī'va, sudāruṇan'taṃ, mett'ambusekavidhinā jitavā mun'indo.
yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, atari cakkhusamuddaṃ saūmiṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ sagāhaṃ sarakkhasaṃ.
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatacatuttiṃsati saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, catuvīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
ajj'uposatho catuddaso
yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharīṭakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ, gaṇhāhi, bhante, yadicchasī'ti
catur'āsītisahassadhammakkhandh'ānubhāvena piṭakattay'ānubhavena jinasāvak'ānubhāvena
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatatesaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, catuvīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
cattālīsam'pi jātiyo paññāsam'pi jātiyo jāti-satam'pi jāti-sahassam'pi jāti-satasahassam'pi aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭakappe aneke'pi vivaṭṭakappe aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe
pañca-cattāḷisa-saṃvaccharāni vasitvā, sappa-saṃvacchare, vesākha-puṇṇamiyaṃ bhummavāre parinibbāyi.

kikī'va aṇḍaṃ, camarī'va vāladhiṃ. piyaṃ'va puttaṃ,
nayanaṃ'va ekakaṃ. tath'eva sīlaṃ, anurakkhamānā.
carato ce'pi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno abhijjhā vigatā hoti, byāpādo vigato hoti, thinamiddhaṃ vigataṃ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vigataṃ hoti
idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato. ayaṃ vuccati, gahapati, cāgasampadā.
niṭṭhite ca pubbakicce, sace so divaso cātuddasīpaṇṇarasīsāmaggīnam'aññataro, yath'ājja uposatho cātuddaso.
cātumahārājikānaṃ sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahassaṃ yāmānaṃ sahassaṃ tusitānaṃ sahassaṃ nimmānaratīnaṃ
gottarakkhitā dhammarakkhitā sasāmikā saparidaṇḍā antamaso mālāguḷa-parikkhittā'pi, tathārūpāsu cārittaṃ āpajjitā hoti
so sīlavā samāno bhabbo ariyānaṃ a'dassanakamyataṃ pahātuṃ ariyadhammassa a'sotukamyataṃ pahātuṃ upārambhacittataṃ pahātuṃ.
cittaviveko ca parisuddhacittānaṃ paramavodānappattānaṃ
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare gimhānautu. asmiṃ utumhi cittamāsassa kāḷapakkhe catutthaṃ, ravivāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

sabba-kāruka-sippāni, cittiṃ katvāna sikkhare.
avūpasantā ajjhattaṃ, sāmaññ'attho'ti acchati .

kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajito'mhi rāja.

alattakakatā pādā, mukhaṃ cuṇṇakamakkhitaṃ.
alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.

alattakakatā pādā, mukhaṃ cuṇṇakamakkhitaṃ.
alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare hem'antautu. asmiṃ utumhi māghamāsassa kāḷapakkhe cuddasamaṃ, candavāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ avidūre nisinnaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
bhante nāgasena, kiṃlakkhaṇā cetanā'ti? cetayitalakkhaṇā, mahārāja, cetanā abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇā cā'ti.
tañ'ca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṃ paṭicca; n'eva rāj'ābhinītā, na cor'ābhinītā, na iṇ'aṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā

sace enti manussattaṃ,
dalidde jāyare kule,
coḷaṃ piṇḍo ratī khiḍḍā,
yattha kicchena labbhati.
ayaṃ vasabha-saṃvacchare hemanta-utu. asmiṃ utumhi māgha-māsassa kālapakkhe chaṭṭhamaṃ, candavāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

dhanañ'ca puttaṃ bhariyañ'ca, chaḍḍayitvāna niggatā.
kaṭacchu-bhikkha-hetū'pi, akicchāni nisevare.
upāsakā bhikkhunisaṅghassa cīvar'atthāya chandakaṃ saṃharitvā, aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā, bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ
yaṃ kho kiñci atītam'addhānaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppajji sabbaṃ taṃ chandamūlakaṃ chandanidānaṃ. chando hi mūlaṃ dukkhassa.
pānīyaparibhojanīyaupaṭṭhapanañ'ca, chand'ārahānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ chand'āharaṇañ'ca, tesaññ'eva akat'uposathānaṃ pārisuddhiyā'pi āharaṇañ'ca
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatatesaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, chabbīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
idam'pi kho, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyassa khaṇḍam'pi chiddam'pi sabalam'pi kammāsam'pi.

aciraṃ vat'ayaṃ kāyo, paṭhaviṃ adhisessati.
chuḍḍho apetaviññāṇo, niratthaṃ'va kaliṅgaraṃ.

vitakk'ūpasame ca yo rato, asubhaṃ bhāvayate sadā sato,
esa kho byanti kāhiti, esa checchati mārabandhanaṃ.
jayanto bodhiyā mūle, sakyānaṃ nandivaḍḍhano. evaṃ tvaṃ vijayo hohi, jayassu jayamaṅgale.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso jar'udapānaṃ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṃ vā nadīviduggaṃ vā, apakass'eva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittaṃ
seyyathā'pi gimhānaṃ pacchime māse ūhataṃ rajojallaṃ, tam'enaṃ mahāakālamegho ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasameti
evaṃ rāg'ādivirahena cakkhuviññāṇamattam'eva me javanaṃ bhavissati, cakkhuviññāṇ'appamāṇen'eva javanaṃ ṭhapessāmī'ti.
bāhuṃ sahassam'abhinimmita sāvudhan'taṃ, grīmekhalaṃ uditaghorasasenamāraṃ, dān'ādidhammavidhinā jitavā mun'indo, tan'tejasā bhavatu te jayamaṅgalāni

kusalānañ'ca dhammānaṃ, paññāya ca parikkhayā.
sabb'ākāravar'ūpetaṃ, lujjate jinasāsanaṃ.
dvīsu mahāpurisalakkhaṇesu kaṅkhati vicikicchati n'ādhimuccati na sampasīdati, kos'ohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahūtajivhatāya ca.

jīno rath'assaṃ maṇikuṇḍale ca, putte ca dāre ca that'eva jīno.
sabbesu bhogesu asesitesu, kasmā na santappasi sokakāle.
jīvit'indriyaṃ, sukh'indriyaṃ, dukkh'indriyaṃ, somanass'indriyaṃ, domanass'indriyaṃ, upekkh'indriyaṃ
saddhammasenā sugatānugo, yo lokassa pāp'ūpakilesajetā, santo sayaṃ santiniyojako ca, svākkhātadhammaṃ viditaṃ karoti

sabbe buddhā balappattā, paccekānañ'ca yaṃ balaṃ, arahantānañ'ca tejena, rakkhaṃ bandhāmi sabbaso.
moggallāna, pacchāpuresaññī caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāsi antogatehi indriyehi a'bahigatena mānasena
ajjhattā dhammā. bahiddhā dhammā. ajjhattabahiddhā dhammā.
maṃsapes'ūpamā kāmā bahusādhāraṇ'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
bāvīsat'indriyāni, cakkhu'ndriyaṃ, sot'indriyaṃ, ghān'indriyaṃ, jivh'indriyaṃ, kāy'indriyaṃ, man'indriyaṃ, itth'indriyaṃ, puris'indriyaṃ
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, bāḷisiko āmisagataṃ baḷisaṃ gambhīre udakarahade pakkhipeyya. tam'enaṃ aññataro āmisacakkhu maccho gileyya.
bhavissanti, bhikkhave, anāgatam'addhānaṃ licchavī sukhumālā mudutalunahatthapādā te mudukāsu seyyāsu tūlabimbohanāsu yāvasūriy'uggamanā seyyaṃ kappissanti.

sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ, kusalassa upasampadā.
sacittapariyodapanaṃ, etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ.

sabbabuddh'ānubhāvena, sadā sotthi bhavantu te
indriyesu guttadvārā bhavissāma, bhojane mattaññuno, jāgariyaṃ anuyuttā, vipassakā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ, bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharissāmā'ti
so kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, uppann'uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ pajaham'eva vinodam'eva byantam'eva naṃ akāsiṃ.
upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocessāma. yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṃ dhāressāmā'ti.

na muṇḍakena samaṇo, abbato alikaṃ bhaṇaṃ.

ekadā dhammarājā pi gelaññen'ābhipīḷito cundattherena taññ'eva bhaṇāpetvāna sādaraṃ sammoditvā ca ābādhā tamhā vuṭṭhāsi ṭhānaso.
handa mayaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmagāthāyo c'eva saṃvegaparikittanapāṭhañca bhaṇāmase

pariccajitvā saddhammaṃ, aññam'aññehi bhaṇḍare.

ye'pi hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatam'addhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ aniccato dakkhissanti dukkhato dakkhissanti anattato dakkhissanti rogato dakkhissanti bhayato dakkhissanti, te taṇhaṃ pajahissanti.
katamo pana, bhante, imamhā papātā añño papāto mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā'ti?
ahaṃ, bhante, pāpakammaṃ akāsiṃ gārayhaṃ bhasmapuṭaṃ. yena me āyasmanto attamanā honti taṃ karomī'ti.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso kāḷakaṃ vatthaṃ paridhāya kese pakiritvā bhasmapuṭaṃ khandhe āropetvā mahājanakāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato
labheyya nu kho so coro coraghātesu, āgamentu tāva bhavanto coraghātā, amukasmiṃ me gāme vā nigame vā mitt'āmaccā ñātisālohitā
bhavasātabaddhā'ti. ekaṃ bhavasātaṃ, sukhā vedanā. dve bhavasātāni, sukhā ca vedanā iṭṭhañ'ca vatthu. tīṇi bhavasātāni, yobbaññaṃ, ārogyaṃ, jīvitaṃ.
jayasiddhi dhanaṃ lābhaṃ sotthi bhāgyaṃ sukhaṃ balaṃ siri āyu ca vaṇṇo ca bhogaṃ vuḍḍhī ca yasavā satavassā ca āyū ca jīvasiddhī bhavantu te.

sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno,
attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye.
handa mayaṃ bhārasuttagāthāyo bhaṇāmase
kusalā cetanā kām'āvacarā rūp'āvacarā dānamayā sīlamayā bhāvanāmayā, ayaṃ vuccati puññ'ābhisaṅkhāro.
utu'kkhānañ'ca, bhikkhugaṇanā'ca, bhikkhunīnam'ovādo cā'ti.
upāsakā bhikkhunisaṅghassa cīvar'atthāya chandakaṃ saṃharitvā, aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā, bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ
atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro sovaṇṇamayaṃ bhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā bhagavato oṇojesi
dhammo padīpo viya tassa satthuno, yo magga-pāk'āmata-bheda-bhinnako, lok'uttaro yo ca tadattha'dīpano
nandopanandabhujagaṃ vibudhaṃ mah'iddhiṃ, puttena therabhujagena dam'āpayanto, iddh'ūpadesavidhinā jitavā mun'indo
na jānaṃ uddissakataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ. yo paribhuñjeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa. anujānāmi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ, adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ aparisaṅkitan'ti.
brahmamārā ca indā ca lokapālā ca devatā, yamo, mittā manussā ca majjhattā verikā'pi ca, sabbe sattā sukhī hontu.
ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati
seyyathā'pi udapatto saṃsaṭṭho lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjiṭṭhāya vā. tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṃ mukhanimittaṃ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṃ na jāneyya na passeyya.
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti tesañ'ca sotabbaṃ maññissanti
maṇḍapeyyam'idaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ, satthā sammukhībhūto.

sītavātaparittāṇaṃ, hirikopīnachādanaṃ.
matt'aṭṭhiyaṃ abhuñjiṃsu, santuṭṭhā itar'ītare.
idaṃ te, tāta sudinna, mātu mattikaṃ, itthikāya itthidhanaṃ, aññaṃ pettikaṃ aññaṃ pitāmahaṃ.
ambil'aggehi'pi, tittak'aggehi'pi, kaṭuk'aggehi'pi, madhur'aggehi'pi, khārikehi'pi, akhārikehi'pi, loṇikehi'pi, aloṇikehi'pi.

yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mam'accayena satthā.
ye santāne hīnā dhammā, yāva nibbānato mamaṃ nassantu sabbadā y'eva.

raṭṭhaṃ sānucaraṃ hantvā, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo.

divā ca ratto ca haranti ye baliṃ, tasmā hi ne rakkhatha appamattā.

ukkhittakhaggamatihatthasudāruṇan'taṃ, dhāvan'tiyojanapath'aṅgulimālavantaṃ. iddhī'bhisaṅkhatamano jitavā mun'indo.
yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ anattā, tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati rūpe, evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī'ti.
etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññ'āgārāni. jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamād'attha, mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī'ti.
micchattaniyatā dhammā. sammattaniyatā dhammā. aniyatā dhammā
yam'pi tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pubb'eva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisatto'va samāno mahato mīḷhapabbatassa upar'ūpari caṅkamati alippamāno mīḷhena
ekasmiṃ samaye nātho moggallānañ'ca kassapaṃ gilāne dukkhite disvā, bojjh'aṅge satta desayi. te ca taṃ abhinanditvā rogā mucciṃsu taṅ'khaṇe.
so an'upārambhacitto samāno bhabbo muṭṭhassaccaṃ pahātuṃ asampajaññaṃ pahātuṃ cetaso vikkhepaṃ pahātuṃ.
bāhuṃ sahassam'abhinimmita sāvudhan'taṃ, grīmekhalaṃ uditaghorasasenamāraṃ, dān'ādidhammavidhinā jitavā mun'indo, tan'tejasā bhavatu te jayamaṅgalāni
dutiyo musalo paripatitvā aññatarassa dārakassa matthake avatthāsi. so kālamakāsi.
kālena ca bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti, atthasaṃhitā ca bhāsitā hoti, mettacittena ca bhāsitā hoti.
aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhāna-pārami, navamaṃ mettāpārami, dasamaṃ upekkhā-pāramī'ti
varaṃ, bhikkhave, sottaṃ. sottaṃ kho pan'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, vañjhaṃ jīvitānaṃ vadāmi, aphalaṃ jīvitānaṃ vadāmi, momūhaṃ jīvitānaṃ vadāmi
ahaṃ, bhante, pāpakammaṃ akāsiṃ gārayhaṃ mosallaṃ, yena me āyasmanto attamanā honti taṃ karomī'ti.
yaṅ'kiñci rūpaṃ atīt'ānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū apaññattaṃ na paññāpessanti, paññattaṃ na samucchindissanti, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattissanti

aṭṭha dhut'aṅgāni, āraññik'aṅgaṃ, piṇḍapātik'aṅgaṃ, paṃsukūlik'aṅgaṃ, tecīvarik'aṅgaṃ, sapadānacārik'aṅgaṃ, khalupacchābhattik'aṅgaṃ, nesajjik'aṅgaṃ, yathāsanthatik'aṅgaṃ, idaṃ vuccati vataṃ, na sīlaṃ.
mettāya cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya ekādas'ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā.
yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatr'ābhinandinī seyyath'īdaṃ kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā

diṭṭhā vā y'eva adiṭṭhā, ye сa dūre vasanti avidūre
bhūtā vā sambhav'esī vā, sabbe sattā bhavantu sukhit'attā.
bhavasātabaddhā'ti. ekaṃ bhavasātaṃ, sukhā vedanā. dve bhavasātāni, sukhā ca vedanā iṭṭhañ'ca vatthu. tīṇi bhavasātāni, yobbaññaṃ, ārogyaṃ, jīvitaṃ.

te kilesā pavaḍḍhantā, āvisanti bahuṃ janaṃ.
kīḷanti maññe bālehi, ummattehi'va rakkhasā.

sududdasaṃ sunipuṇaṃ, yatthakāma-nipātino,
cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī, cittaṃ guttaṃ sukh'āvahaṃ.
sambādho ghar'āvāso rajopatho abbhokāso pabbajjā.
n'āhaṃ taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā rajjan'ādivasena uppajjituṃ dassāmī'ti evam'ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atha kho āyasmā raṭṭhapālo sakapitu nivesane n'eva dānaṃ alattha na paccakkhānaṃ, añña'd'atthu akkosam'eva alattha
handa mayaṃ raṭṭhapālattheragāthāyo bhaṇāmase
icc'evam accantanamassanīyaṃ namassamāno ratanattayaṃ yaṃ puññ'ābhisandaṃ vipulaṃ alatthaṃ, tass'ānubhāvena hat'antarāyo.

vītarāgā ramissanti, na te kāmagavesino.
tesaṃ rasapathaviṃ aṅguliyā sāyataṃ acchādesi, taṇhā ca tesaṃ okkami.

no ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃcaraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ,

tattha, sātthakasampajaññaṃ, sappāyasampajaññaṃ, gocarasampajaññaṃ, asammohasampajaññaṃ'ti catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ.

rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā, te suppaṭipannā. ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṃ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
na suppaṭippassaddho, opakkamikā ce'pi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti, abhabbāva te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāya.
ayañ'ca kho dakkhiṇā dinnā, saṅghamhi suppatiṭṭhitā. dīgharattaṃ hitāy'assa, ṭhānaso upakappati.
sunakkhattaṃ sumaṅgalaṃ, supabhātaṃ suvuṭṭhitaṃ. sukhaṇo sumuhutto ca, suyiṭṭhaṃ brahmacārisu.
tesu na mānaṃ kayirātha, tesu assa sagāravo, ty'assa apacitā assu, ty'assu sādhu supūjitā.
bhaddakā vat'ime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vat'ime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me na'y'ime pāṇinā pahāraṃ dentī'ti.
iminā puññakammena, iminā uddissena ca khipp'āhaṃ sulabhe c'eva taṇh'ūpādānachedanaṃ.
buddho susuddho karuṇāmah'aṇṇavo, yo'ccantasuddhabbarañāṇalocano, lokassa pāp'ūpakilesaghātako
ahi āviñcheyya vammikaṃ pavekkhāmī'ti, susumāro āviñcheyya udakaṃ pavekkhāmī'ti, pakkhī āviñcheyya ākāsaṃ ḍessāmī'ti

karaṇīyam'atthakusalena, yaṃ taṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca:
sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, suvaco c'assa mudu, anatimānī.
atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etad'avoca, kiṃ nu kho, āvuso ānanda, ahaṃ sūcivāṇijako, tvaṃ sūcikāro, udāhu ahaṃ sūcikāro, tvaṃ sūcivāṇijako'ti?
nāḷāgiriṃ gajavaraṃ atimattabhūtaṃ, dāv'aggicakkam'asanī'va, sudāruṇan'taṃ, mett'ambusekavidhinā jitavā mun'indo.
yesaṃ mayaṃ paribhuñjāma cīvarapiṇḍapātasen'āsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ tesaṃ te kārā amhesu mahapphalā bhavissanti mah'ānisaṃsā'ti

ye ca atītā sambuddhā, ye ca buddhā anāgatā.
yo c'eta'r'ahi sambuddho, bahunnaṃ sokanāsano.
cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassaṃ sokasallaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati soko.

ime kho, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ, na'y'idha paññāyetha mātā'ti vā mātucchā'ti vā mātulānī'ti vā ācariyabhariyā'ti vā garūnaṃ dārā'ti vā. sambhedaṃ loko agamissa, yathā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā.
varaṃ, bhikkhave, sottaṃ. sottaṃ kho pan'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, vañjhaṃ jīvitānaṃ vadāmi, aphalaṃ jīvitānaṃ vadāmi, momūhaṃ jīvitānaṃ vadāmi
ek'āsanik'aṅgaṃ pattapiṇḍik'aṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattik'aṅgaṃ āraññik'aṅgaṃ rukkhamūlik'aṅgaṃ abbhokāsik'aṅgaṃ sosānik'aṅgaṃ
tathārūpesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu uddh'aggikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti sovaggikaṃ sukhavipākaṃ saggasaṃvattanikaṃ.
āsītikaṃ vā nāvutikaṃ vā vassasatikaṃ vā jātiyā jiṇṇaṃ gopānasivaṅkaṃ bhoggaṃ daṇḍaparāyaṇaṃ pavedhamānaṃ gacchantaṃ
so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evam'assa vacanīyo: mā, āyasmā, attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi, vacanīyam'ev'āyasmā attānaṃ karotu.
tattha katamo kāyasaṅkhāro? kāyasañcetanā kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsañcetanā vacīsaṅkhāro, manosañcetanā cittasaṅkhāro.
so evaṃ pajānāti, n'atthi nu kho taṃ kiñci lokasmiṃ yam'ahaṃ upādiyamāno na vajjavā assaṃ.
gahaṭṭhapaṇḍak'ādayo ekavīsati vajjanīyā puggalā hatthapāsato bahikaraṇavasena vajjetabbā. te asmiṃ na honti.

nekatikā vañcanikā, kūṭasakkhī apāṭukā.
bahūhi parikappehi, āmisaṃ paribhuñjare.
mada-nimmadanāya pipāsavinayāya ālayasamugghātāya vaṭṭ'upacchedāya taṇhakkhayāya virāgāya nirodhāya nibbānāya dhammo desito?
āyuvaḍḍhako, dhanavaḍḍhako, sirivaḍḍhako, yasavaḍḍhako, balavaḍḍhako, vaṇṇavaḍḍhako, sukhavaḍḍhako hotu sabbadā
yam'pi, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anāḷhiko iṇaṃ ādiyitvā vaḍḍhiṃ paṭissuṇāti, vaḍḍhi'pi, bhikkhave, dukkhā lokasmiṃ kāmabhogino'ti?
saddhassa, bhikkhave, sāvakassa satthusāsane pariyogāya vattato rumhaniyaṃ satthusāsanaṃ hoti ojavantaṃ.

udar'āvadehakaṃ bhutvā, sayant'uttānaseyyakā.
kathaṃ vattenti paṭibuddhā, yā kathā satthugarahitā.
namo omak'ātītassa tassa vatthuttayassa'pi. namokārappabhāvena vigacchantu upaddavā.
bhavasātabaddhā'ti. ekaṃ bhavasātaṃ, sukhā vedanā. dve bhavasātāni, sukhā ca vedanā iṭṭhañ'ca vatthu. tīṇi bhavasātāni, yobbaññaṃ, ārogyaṃ, jīvitaṃ.
so kalyāṇamitto samāno bhabbo assaddhiyaṃ pahātuṃ a'vadaññutaṃ pahātuṃ kosajjaṃ pahātuṃ.
attā me uppajjati ca veti cā'ti icc'assa evam'āgataṃ hoti. tasmā taṃ na upapajjati, cakkhu attā'ti yo vadeyya. iti cakkhu anattā.
tam'enaṃ evaṃ vadeyyuṃ - idāni, ambho purisa, imaṃ suññaṃ gāmaṃ corā gāmaghātakā vadhissanti.
icc'evam'ek'anta-abhipūjaneyyakaṃ vatthuttayaṃ vandayat'ābhisaṅkhataṃ
āvuso āgantuka, kuṭumbikassa te gehe bhattaṃ bhuñjanato varataraṃ mīḷhaṃ khādituṃ
satto'ti laggo. guhāyan'ti kāye. kāyo hi rāg'ādīnaṃ vāḷānaṃ vasan'okāsato guhā'ti vuccati.
pañcacattāḷisasaṃvaccharāni vasitvā, sappasaṃvacchare, vesākhapuṇṇamiyaṃ bhummavāre parinibbāyi.
evaṃ utuācikkhanaṃ. utūn'īdha pana sāsane hem'antagimhavassānānaṃ vasena tīṇi honti.
aññatarasmiṃ āvāse vass'ūpagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāmo corehi vuṭṭhāsi.
rūpappaṭisaṃvedī'ti nīlapīt'ādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vavatthāpento rūpaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti
yathā vārivahā pūrā paripūrenti sāgaraṃ, evam'eva ito dinnaṃ petānaṃ upakappati.
etā pi buddhajayamaṅgalaaṭṭhagāthā, yo vācano dinadine sarate'm'atandī, hitvān'anekavividhāni c'upaddavāni, mokkhaṃ sukhaṃ adhigameyya naro sapañño
padakkhiṇaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vācākammaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ, padakkhiṇaṃ manokammaṃ paṇīdhi te padakkhiṇe. padakkhiṇāni katvāna, labhant'atthe padakkhiṇe.
ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ. atha kho vāseṭṭho upāsako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
so vikkhittacitto samāno abhabbo ayonisomanasikāraṃ pahātuṃ kummaggasevanaṃ pahātuṃ cetaso līnattaṃ pahātuṃ.

tiṭṭhañ'caraṃ, nisinno vā, sayāno vā, yāvat'assa vigatamiddho,
etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyya, brahmam'etaṃ vihāraṃ idha'm'āhu.

sahā'v'assa dassanasampadāya, taya'ssu dhammā jahitā bhavanti.
sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchitañ'ca, sīlabbataṃ vā pi yad'atthi kiñci.
pañcakkhandhā, rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.

akakkasaṃ viññāpaniṃ, giraṃ saccam'udīraye,
yāya n'ābhisaje kañci, tam'ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
amarā-vitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ par'ānudayatā-paṭisaṃyutta-vitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ lābhasakkārasiloka-paṭisaṃyutta-vitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ

yācako appiyo hoti, yācaṃ adadam'appiyo.
tasm'āhaṃ taṃ na yācāmi, mā me videssanā ahū'ti.

kileseh'ābhibhūtā te, tena tena vidhāvitā.
narā kilesa-vatthūsu, sasaṅgāme'va ghosite.
bāhuṃ sahassam'abhinimmita sāvudhan'taṃ, grīmekhalaṃ uditaghorasasenamāraṃ, dān'ādidhammavidhinā jitavā mun'indo, tan'tejasā bhavatu te jayamaṅgalāni
namokār'ānubhāvena suvatthi hotu sabbadā. namokārassa tejena vidhimhi homi tejavā
yo cakkhumā mohamal'āpakaṭṭho, sāmaṃ va buddho sugato vimutto, mārassa pāsā vinimocayanto, pāpesi khemaṃ janataṃ vineyyaṃ
sattisūl'ūpamā kāmā vinivijjhan'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
yo cakkhumā mohamal'āpakaṭṭho, sāmaṃ va buddho sugato vimutto, mārassa pāsā vinimocayanto, pāpesi khemaṃ janataṃ vineyyaṃ
mamāyitaṃ vatthuṃ vipariṇāma-saṃkino'pi phandanti, vipariṇamante'pi phandanti, vipariṇate'pi phandanti

na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino.
adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggatiṃ.
jhānapaccayo, maggapaccayo, sampayuttapaccayo, vippayuttapaccayo, atthipaccayo, n'atthipaccayo, vigatapaccayo, avigatapaccayo.

na dīgham'āyuṃ labhate dhanena, na c'āpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti.
appaṃ h'idaṃ jīvitam'āhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.
yāv'āhaṃ tesaṃ uddisitvā āgacchāmī'ti, udāhu vippalapan'tass'eva coraghātā sīsaṃ chindeyyun'ti?
ādevitattaṃ paridevitattaṃ palāpo vippalāpo lālappo lālappanā lālappitattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati paridevo.
yaṃ viditvā sato caran'ti yaṃ viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.
yaṃ viditvā sato caran'ti yaṃ viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.

ye me pubbe viyākaṃsu, huraṃ gotamasāsanā,
icc'āsi iti bhavissati, sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihaṃ,
sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ, n'āhaṃ tattha abhiramiṃ.
evaṃ rāg'ādivirahena cakkhuviññāṇamattam'eva me javanaṃ bhavissati, cakkhuviññāṇ'appamāṇen'eva javanaṃ ṭhapessāmī'ti.
katamañ'ca, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ? yo tassā'y'eva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo
agge dhamme pasannānaṃ, virāg'ūpasame sukhe. agge saṅghe pasannānaṃ, puññakkhette anuttare.
bojjh'aṅgo satisaṅkhāto dhammānaṃ vicayo tathā viriyam'pītipassaddhi bojjh'aṅgā ca tathā'pare samādh'upekkhabojjh'aṅgā.
catutthaṃ paññā-pārami, pañcamaṃ viriyapārami, chaṭṭhamaṃ khanti-pārami, sattamaṃ sacca-pārami
yattha jāto bhave bhave ujucitto satipañño sallekho viriyavā'minā.

kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajito'mhi rāja.
catūhi mahādevarājūhi kat'āradhanaṃ paṭicca pañca mahāvilokane viloketvā
catūhi mahādevarājūhi kat'āradhanaṃ paṭicca pañca mahāvilokane viloketvā
nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya, visaññogāya dhammo desito no saññogāya, anupādānāya dhammo desito no saupādānāya!
sayaṃ samattaṃ karoti paripuṇṇaṃ karoti anomaṃ karoti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ karoti.
diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāraṃ diṭṭhivisūkaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ.
na oramattakena vises'ādhigamena antarāvosānaṃ āpajjissanti
atha kho so bhikkhu vihāraṃ pavisissāmī'ti kavāṭaṃ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṃ vihāraṃ ahinā puṇṇaṃ, vātapānehi bhoge nikkhante, disvāna bhīto vissaram'akāsi.
sabb'ītiyo vivajjantu, sabbarogo vinassatu, mā te bhavatv'antarāyo, sukhī dīgh'āyuko bhava.
tena kho pana samayena satta ca jaṭilā satta ca nigaṇṭhā satta ca acelakā satta ca ekasāṭakā satta ca paribbājakā parūḷhakacchanakhalomā khārivividham'ādāya bhagavato avidūre atikkamanti.

na dīgham'āyuṃ labhate dhanena, na c'āpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti.
appaṃ h'idaṃ jīvitam'āhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.

tasmā hi te sukhino vītasokā, yesaṃ piyaṃ n'atthi kuhiñci loke.
tasmā asokaṃ virajaṃ patthayāno, piyaṃ na kayirātha kuhiñci loke'ti.

ete ca ñatvā upanissitā'ti, ñatvā munī nissaye so vimaṃsī,
ñatvā vimutto na vivādam'eti, bhav'ābhavāya na sameti dhīro'ti.
yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādeyya, so ca puggalo anupasampanno te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, idaṃ tasmiṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
ajja't'agge'ti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvā, ajja'd'agge'ti vā pāṭho, dakāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṃ katvā'ti vuttaṃ hoti.
tassa kho evaṃ, bhaddāli, bhikkhuno bhikkhū tathā tathā upaparikkhanti yath'āss'idaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ na khippam'eva vūpasammati.
na veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmī'ti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pañcakkhandhā, rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.
brahmamārā ca indā ca lokapālā ca devatā, yamo, mittā manussā ca majjhattā verikā'pi ca, sabbe sattā sukhī hontu.

susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, verinesu averino,
verinesu manussesu, viharāma averino.
pañcatiṃsatime saṃvacchare vesākhapuṇṇamiyaṃ sammā sambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā
tathāgatappaveditā c'assa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā.
diṭṭhamattaṃ nāma tatth'eva uppannaṃ sampaṭicchana-santīraṇa-voṭṭhabbana-saṅkhātaṃ cittattayaṃ.
tathāgatappaveditā c'assa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā.
tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya anatthakāmo ahitakāmo ayogakkhemakāmo jīvitā voropetukāmo.
paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmi yāva'd'eva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāya ḍaṃsamakasavāt'ātapasiriṃsapasamphassānaṃ paṭighātāya yāva'd'eva hirikopīnapaṭicchādan'atthaṃ

na brāhmaṇass'etad'akiñci seyyo, yadā nisedho manaso piyehi,
yato yato hiṃsamano nivattati, tato tato sammati'm'eva dukkhaṃ.
hīno'ham'asmī'ti vā samanupassanti; kim'aññatra yathābhūtassa adassanā?

manujassa pamattacārino, taṇhā vaḍḍhati māluvā viya,
so plavatī hurā huraṃ, phalam'icchaṃ'va vanasmi vānaro.
dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā. bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā. n'eva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā
alaṃ, āvuso, mā socittha, mā paridevittha, sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇena. upaddutā ca homa, idaṃ vo kappati, idaṃ vo na kappatī'ti.
